catalog_info.title: Electron Microscopy Laboratory
catalog_info.notes: Primarily for graduate students planning to use TEM for their research.
catalog_info.description: Lectures and laboratory instruction on transmission electron microscopy (TEM) and Cs corrected, aberration-correction microscopy and microanalysis. Lab classes include; diffraction, dark field imaging, X-ray spectroscopy, electron energy-loss spectroscopy, atomic imaging, materials sample preparation, polymers, and biological samples.
